mapper.insert: insert into testing_record (httpSampleId, name, threadGroups, threadGroupCursor, activeThreads, scope, beginUserIndex, iterations, currentIteration, requestsPerThread, status) values (#{httpSampleId}, #{name}, #{threadGroups,typeHandler=com.bomber.handler.IntegerListHandler}, #{threadGroupCursor}, #{activeThreads}, #{scope}, #{beginUserIndex}, #{iterations}, #{currentIteration}, #{requestsPerThread}, #{status})
mapper.update: update testing_record set threadGroupCursor = #{threadGroupCursor}, activeThreads = #{activeThreads}, currentIteration = #{currentIteration}, status = #{status}, startTime = #{startTime}, endTime = #{endTime}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from testing_record order by id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
select * from testing_record where httpSampleId = ${httpSampleId} order by id desc
